r.d: This is a Renderer driver for Structures_DataGrid using Smarty. It adds a couple of variables to a Smarty instance.
r.n:
Changes since Structures_DataGrid 0.6.3:
- Renderer driver unbundled from Structures_DataGrid core - some new variables will be added to the Smarty instance - bug #5723: fixed the return value of getSmarty() (thanks <adrian dot rotea at gmail dot com>)
